data.text: @gerrygraves @CTVNews ahaha right. & that makes you what? obviously afraid of your own shadow. im not trying to be "tuff", especially not on Twitter. but seriously, if you are that scared of the "world". maybe its better you stay inside. so we can take care of the world for ya. your better off in bed.
